content: zimmtoy crab by marnie jedynak june 2008 use 6 0mm crochet hook for body claws and legs worsted weight acrylic yarn was used in this pattern single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet decrease = single_crochet two stitches together decrease crab body make 1 follow directions for starting a magic magic_ring found at http //www crochetme com/dec_jan_0405/reads_round html do steps 1 to 6 of magic_ring instructions chain 2 round 1 6 single_crochet into loop place a marker to indicate beginning of round 6 stitches round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around - 12 stitches round 3 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around - 18 stitches round 4 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around - 24 stitches round 5 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat from * around - 30 stitches round 6 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet repeat from * around - 36 stitches round 7 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet repeat from * around - 42 stitches rounds 8-12 single_crochet in each single_crochet around round 13 *decrease single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet repeat from * around - 36 stitches round 14 *decrease single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet repeat from * around - 30 stitches round 15 *decrease single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat from * around - 24 stitches stuff body with fibre fill do any decorative stitch work on top of body now if you wish round 16 *decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around - 18 stitches round 17 *decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around - 12 stitches round 18 decrease around - 6 stitches slip a stitch and pull long tail of yarn through loop to knot using yarn needle weave tail yarn through 6 stitches and pull to close knot push needle with yarn through body to other side and cut off excess to secure tail yarn fluff body so tail yarn disappears inside crab front claws make 2 follow directions for starting a magic magic_ring found at http //www crochetme com/dec_jan_0405/reads_round html do steps 1 to 6 of magic_ring instructions chain 2 round 1 6 single_crochet into loop place a marker to indicate beginning of round 6 stitches round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around - 12 stitches round 3 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat 4 times from stitch 9 to 12 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet 20 stitches round 4 and 5 single_crochet in each single_crochet stuff claw lightly round 6 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet 13 stitches round 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet 13 stitches round 8 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat 4 times single_crochet last stitch 9 stitches when done slip_stitch and pull yarn tail through to knot leaving long enough tail to attach claw to body claw thumb chain 5 turn single_crochet in each
